  "title": "Business Manager",
  "description": "Tivana Workforce is a workforce solutions company that provides services that unlock the full potential of human capital to drive business excellence and growth in an ever-evolving marketplace. Our Services include Staffing and Recruitment, Workforce Management, Training and Development, Technology Solutions, HR Consulting, Team Retreat Planning and Specialized services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Business Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time
Reports To: Managing Director / CEO
Industry: Retail (Footwear)

Job Summary


	The Business Manager oversees the overall operations, sales performance, and profitability of the shoe retail business.
	This role involves strategic planning, business development, staff supervision, customer relationship management, and ensuring efficient store operations
	The ideal candidate will combine strong commercial acumen with leadership and retail management expertise to drive growth and enhance customer satisfaction.


Key Responsibilities
Business Operations Management:


	Oversee daily retail operations across all store locations.
	Ensure adherence to operational standards, inventory control, and visual merchandising guidelines.
	Monitor stock levels, manage supplier relationships, and ensure timely product replenishment.
	Implement operational efficiency strategies to reduce waste and optimize resources.


Sales &amp; Revenue Growth:


	Develop and execute sales strategies to achieve revenue targets and profitability goals.
	Analyze sales trends and customer behavior to identify growth opportunities.
	Lead promotional campaigns, pricing strategies, and product launches.
	Track sales performance and prepare periodic business performance reports.


Team Leadership &amp; Staff Management:


	Supervise, train, and motivate retail and administrative teams.
	Set performance goals and conduct regular performance reviews.
	Foster a culture of accountability, teamwork, and customer service excellence.


Financial Management:


	Prepare and manage the business budget, including sales forecasts and expense control.
	Monitor cash flow, expenses, and profitability.


Marketing &amp; Brand Development:


	Oversee social media, digital marketing, and in-store promotional activities.
	Ensure brand consistency across all marketing and customer touchpoints.


Customer Experience &amp; Relationship Management:


	Maintain high standards of customer service across all stores.
	Handle escalated customer issues professionally and effectively.


Qualifications &amp; Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Retail Management, or related field.
	Minimum of 5 years&rsquo; experience in retail or business management (preferably in fashion, footwear, or lifestyle brands).
	Strong leadership, communication, and people management skills.
	Proven ability to achieve sales targets and manage business operations.
	Analytical thinker with proficiency in MS Office and inventory software.
	Excellent organizational and decision-making abilities.


Key Competencies:


	Strategic and commercial mindset
	Leadership and team development
	Financial and analytical skills
	Strong customer orientation
	Negotiation and vendor management
	Adaptability and problem-solving.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Photograph to:&nbsp;tivanaworkforce@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Receptionist",
  "description": "Sewa Assets Management Limited -&nbsp;We are an assets management and finance consultancy firm positioned to meet the ever-changing demands and requirements of our clients in the 21st century.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Receptionist
Job Location:&nbsp;Victoria Island,&nbsp; Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	We are looking for a receptionist to be responsible for greeting clients and visitors to our office.

Job Summary

	The Machining & Maintenance Services Manager will be responsible for establishing, managing, and growing the company’s Machine & Maintenance Services Unit.

Key Responsibilities
Business Development & Client Engagement:


	Identify and secure machine shop projects and contracts to ensure business growth and profitability

Quality, Safety & Compliance

	Maintain accurate documentation of production metrics, maintenance activities, and staff performance
